info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Transylvania, northeastern Jackson and southeastern Haywood Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waynesville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynesville, Lake Junaluska, Clyde, Graveyard Fields, B.R. Parkway-Black Balsam To Mount Pisgah, Mount Pisgah, B.R. Parkway-Balsam Gap To Black Balsam Area, Black Balsam Area, Balsam and Maggie Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
